channel.title: DIP on 有鸟止南方之阜
channel.description: Recent content in DIP on 有鸟止南方之阜

item.title: 依赖倒置原则
item.description: 定义 依赖倒置原则（Dependence Inversion Principle，DIP）：高层模块不应该依赖底层模块，两者都应该依赖其抽象；抽象不应该依赖细节，细节应该依赖抽象（High level modules shouldnot depend upon low level modules.Both should depend upon abstractions.Abstractions should not depend upon details. Details should depend upon abstractions）。其核心思想是面向接口编程，不要面向实现编程.
